name: Claim
description: Allows you to claim from all or any of the tranq staking pools (including lending or borrowing).

name: Stake
description: Allows you to stake in any of the tranq staking pools (not including lending or borrowing).

name: Add or Remove Liquidity
description: Adds or removes liquidity on ViperSwap.

name: Staking
description: Stakes or unstakes your LP with an existing farm pool on ViperSwap.

name: Add or Remove Liquidity
description: Adds or removes liquidity on Defira.

name: Staking
description: Stakes or unstakes your LP with an existing farm pool on Defira.

name: Gem Mines Claim All
description: Performs a claim all on the gem mines.

name: Pool Party Claim All
description: Performs a claim all on the pool parties.

name: Stake
description: Stakes tokens in a Pool Party.

name: Staking
description: Stakes or unstakes your LP with an existing farm pool on DefiKingdoms.
